properties.name: rental.minimum-rent-days
properties.description: A minimum rent days amount. Attempting to rent less than this amount of days will be rejected.

properties.name: rental.maximum-rent-days
properties.description: A maximum rent days amount. Attempting to rent more than this amount of days will be rejected.

properties.name: rental.minimum-discount-percent
properties.description: The minimum valid discount. Discounts below 0 or this number will be rejected.

properties.name: rental.maximum-discount-percent
properties.description: The maximum discount that can be applied to a rental. Discounts above 100% will be rejected.
